text: Saint-Lô is a commune. It is in the Manche department in west France. ==Sister cities== Saint-Lô is twinned with: * Saint-Ghislain, Belgium, since 1961 * Aalen, Germany, since 1979 * Christchurch, UK, since 1985 * Kervénanec, Lorient, France, since 1988 * Roanoke, Virginia, US, since 1999 Category:Communes in Manche Category:Departmental capitals in France
title: Saint-Lô
